name: Simpler Google
description:
Many visual elements have been removed, and colours changed - resulting in a much more minimal look for the Google search engine.

There is also a 'Brandless' edition available: style 97176
additional_info:
21/1/2014:-
~Fixed a bug that would cause search suggestions to remain stuck to the top of the page, forcing the user to scroll up to see them: this no longer occurs.

15/1/2014:-
~Removed some borders for a cleaner appearance
~Made search bar 'fixed,' it will now follow the user as they scroll down the page

28/12/2013:-
~Notices below search box removed (front page)
~Selected search method now matches search box colour
~Fixed the 'search tools' box so that it will not longer display a background or border
~Fixed a formatting issue that may have caused inconsistencies between browsers
~Other minor tweaks

23/12/2013:-
~Initial Release
